content:
Hello - on behalf of the HTA, this is an announcement that three code systems have been registered with the HTA by Canada Health Infoway. They are as follows:
Standards Collaborative Healthcare Provider Types (SCPTYPE) https://confluence.hl7.org/pages/viewpage.action?pageId=90898448
Standards Collaborative Healthcare Qualification Types (SCPQUAL) https://confluence.hl7.org/pages/viewpage.action?pageId=90898454
Standards Collaborative Temporary Codes (SCTEMP) https://confluence.hl7.org/pages/viewpage.action?pageId=90898445

For additional information, please see contact details on the pages above. Please note some of the content is still being fleshed out and descriptive content may change.
@Joel Francis @Ted Klein
OK. There are old, and now incorrect, entries for all 3 of these in UTG that came in with the v3 coremif import. They need to be put in the queue to be fixed.
